name: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson, Owatonna

reviews.text: A family funeral brought us to the Country Inn and Suites. A family group traveling together required 4 rooms close to the interstate and this property was just right. The rooms were clean and comfortable, the hours for breakfast were convenient and the food options satisfied everyone's tastes. The quiet location was disrupted around 9am by a parking lot resurfacing project, but no one was annoyed or irritated by the work. If our travels require us to stay in this part of southern Minnesota again, we will definitely visit this property again.
reviews.title: Quick Trip-Nice Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The reservation lady was very polite and courteous. The room was extremely clean and well maintained. The breakfast was also something to brag about and I would recommend this hotel to anyone. It was very close to restaurants within walking distance.
reviews.title: Very Nice

reviews.text: Here is my complete review! Check in was super easy with their express check ins! I got in right away with no hassle. Upon check in there was also a large cookie jar and a big help-yourself penny candy jar, and it had my favorite candy in it! RootBeer Barrels!
reviews.title: Best Service You Will Get

reviews.text: You can tell that this hotel has been renovated. Renovated hotels are extreamly important to me because of the feel of the hotel. The rooms were well made up and very clean. I couldn't find one thing wrong, I can tell that the housekeepers work very hard.
reviews.title: Suite stay!

reviews.text: Breakfast was the best I've had in ages. The rotating hot breakfast is what makes this one so unique. If you stay for more than one day, you won't have the same hot breakfast twice! Another nice feature about this breakfast is the build your own parfait bar. While other hotels offer you individual boring yogurt, here you can top your yogurt with fresh fruit!
reviews.title: Comfortable

reviews.text: I had a great stay at the Country Inn and Suites! The rooms are very clean the service was excellent! The free breakfast in the morning was a great benefit. Everything was well stocked and they had a great variety of options. I will definitely be returning to the Country Inn and Suites. Thank you for such a great stay!
reviews.title: Going on vacation?? Stay at the Country Inn and Suites!

reviews.text: My stay at the Country Inn and Suites was a very pleasant experience. They had many varieties at breakfast of what I could eat for food. And it was overall very nice. I rather enjoyed the pool and the fitness center. I'm looking forward to my next day at the Country Inn and Suites in Owatonna.
reviews.title: My stay at Country Inn and Suites

reviews.text: I stayed here recently for a night on business. Front desk staff were very friendly and very thorough on explanation of breakfast, services, etc. The room was clean, the bed was comfortable and the bathroom was in good shape. I typically stay in Marriott's, and sometimes in this level of a hotel, the room leaves something to be desired. I found it to be better than most! The room was quiet, and I was next to the elevator. Overall, would stay again if needed.
reviews.title: Clean and Quiet

reviews.text: We stayed one night on our way home from the Elko/New Market area. It is a very convenient hotel located right off I-35. We checked in a little late in the evening but the receptionists were very friendly and helpful. They gave me all the information I needed including when breakfast was served the next morning. The room was neat and clean. It is looked near a gas station and a few fast-food restaurants along with a few sit-down.
reviews.title: Stay on Way Home from Elko/New Market

reviews.text: We chose to stay at another Country Inn as our stay in Baxter MN was so good. Well, it just goes to show you that chain hotels are not the same in each town. The hotel was decent enough, but the pool? The entire thing was only 3 to 3.5 feet deep and very small. For someone with a teenager, it was quite a let down.
reviews.title: Decent place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice stop. Nothing fancy but clean, updated, nice bed, nice shower, microwave, fridge, flat screen tv...all at a decent price. I will stay again when I am in Owatonna. Thanks for the good night's sleep!!
reviews.title: This should be ranked as Trip Advisor's No. 1 choice in Owatonna.

reviews.text: this hotel is just off of I-35 and very convenient. my room was very nice and very roomy. i really like the couch and chair.
reviews.title: great location

reviews.text: My wife and I stayed one night before heading on to visit relatives. We booked the room online and the rate was comparble to the other hotels in the area. When we arrived we discovered the hotel was basically full because of a boys squirt hockey tournament. There were many kids in pool and hot tub all evening, we decided not to use either.
reviews.title: Clean rooms ok location

reviews.text: The bed was comfortable, but a little soft for our taste. The bed was not sunken in though. The room was very clean however our room was small. The room was generally pretty good at blocking out the sound of the kids running up and down the hallways until about 10pm, but did not block out all the noise. Thankfully they did actually go to bed around 10pm.
reviews.title: hockey tournament

reviews.text: We would consider staying here again, but would also check other hotels in the area.
reviews.title: Decent

reviews.text: Due to HORRIBLE weather on my way home from working out of the state, I pulled off the highway to stay for the night, stopped two other places before finding a room here. First off Jessica at the front desk greeted me with a warm smile and welcomed me right in. She was able to get me the last available room in the hotel for the night. The entire facility is clean and bright! Room was in wonderful shape and was above my expectations. I had less than stellar expectations, but was impressed by the great room and EXCELLENT customer service from Jessica, who called to check if all was ok and if I needed anything for my stay. Because I hadn't planned on staying the night, I didn't have any toiletries... One phone call to Jessica and I was greeted at my door with a toothbrush, toothpaste, deodorant, and even detergent for the guest washing machines! If I'm ever in the area again I will stop here in a heart beat!!
reviews.title: BEST customer service in town

reviews.text: As we travel to Owatonna each year for a show we have stayed in a less expensive hotel but this year we decided to upgrade to Carlson's Country Inn. Best thing we ever did! Quiet, clean, excellent breakfast and very friendly staff. We will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Definitely will return to this great hotel!

reviews.text: It was as if my wife and I were placed in an empty room and instructed to build the perfect motel room. We would have built the very room we stayed in in Owatonna, MN.
reviews.title: Everything you want

reviews.text: Staff were friendly, efficient and accommodating.
reviews.title: Got kicked out

reviews.text: Pool area was clean and comfortable.
reviews.title: Friendly Staff

description: The "new" Country Inn & Suites Owatonna! We just recently completed a renovation which includes; remodeled guestrooms and lobby, expanded breakfast room, along with a new fitness center, business center and guest laundry. And, all of our rooms are now equipped with refrigerators, microwaves and flat screen TVs. We offer complimentary hot breakfast featuring fresh waffles, along with biscuits & gravy, sausage, eggs, hot and cold cereals, fruit, yogurt parfait, breads and pastries, juices, coffee, tea and milk. We also have an indoor pool and spa, free high speed wireless internet access and many restaurants are close to the hotel.
